    • trySlide

      private boolean trySlide​(power.Tile tile, int yDirection, int xDirection)
      slides tiles through neighbour tiles with 0 value or merges with tile with the same value
      Parameters:
      tile - current tile, that might be merged with another tile
      Returns:
      true, if tile was merged with another tile, otherwise false
